name: You Are Slime
description:
The premise of You Are Slime (by me, Jordan Resin) came about when I looked inside myself and wondered...what if I were a virtual pet? What if I were a blob of goo with just one distinguishing feature? Who would want to adopt me? How could I convince a loving family to take me in as one of their own?

So here's the deal: you've gotta impress your potential parents with quick tricks. They'll call something out, and you'll press the red character on your keyboard to perform it. You can't spend too long on any one stunt, or they'll begin to question your intelligence (and try not to hit a key that corresponds with another trick while you're at it). Manage twenty five without slipping up three times, and you're golden. Thanks for playing, and good luck!
